products.description: FAMILY OWNED FOR GENERATIONS: Meinl is a German family name and market-leading global brand of professional percussion instruments; the company was founded 1951 in Gutenstetten, Germany, and our generations-long family ownership continues today     WHY IT MATTERS: we keep a family culture of loyal employees that have a passion for music and gear; this allows us to develop deep ties with world-class producers and innovate quickly—resulting in outstanding quality professional instruments     ZOOM IN: the Meinl Sonic Energy Small Steel Tongue Drum has a light and airy sound; its compact size is easily portable to play just about anywhere     HOW IT WORKS: it's simple—use the mallets to tap the steel tongues in any order (there are no wrong notes); the tongues are pre-tuned to a scale, so their notes complement each other     DRIVING THE SOUND: made with coated high-quality stainless steel, and equipped with a protective cap to place on any surface; the steel body is solid, but its sound is delicate and soothing     COMES WITH MALLETS AND BAG: includes wood mallet pair with rubber heads and drawstring travel bag; the mallets draw relaxing tones from the drum similar to a wind chime     BY THE NUMBERS: 7" x 7" x 2.6", 1.3 pounds; eight notes tuned to G Minor scale (G4, Bb4, C5, D5, F5, G5, Bb5, C6)     THE TAKEAWAY: you'll be able to play simple tunes in minutes with practically no learning curve; recommended to anyone wanting a soft, tranquil steel drum tone for sound therapy sessions, meditation, yoga, playing at home, or in a classroom

products.description: REALISTIC FROG SOUNDS: This Deluxe Extra-Large 8" frog sound maker produces a realistic frog ribbit or croaking sound. When used correctly, it can function as a cricket-like, high-pitch guiro or as a wood tone block, making it an excellent addition to any musical ensemble or solo performance.     NATURAL WOOD FINISH: Carved from a solid piece of wood, this traditional frog guiro features a natural brown wood finish that ensures durability and longevity without any paint to chip. This wooden frog instrument includes a stick for creating a variety of frog-like sounds.     HOW TO PLAY: Use the included wood stick to gently rake up the frog's back to create a lower-pitch cricket chirp. For a different sound, lightly tap the nose of the frog with the thick end of the striker to produce a tenor note as a wood tone block. Conveniently store the striker in the frog's mouth when not in use.     EXCELLENT ACOUSTICS: This authentic natural frog guiro offers excellent acoustics and versatility, making it a must-have frog instrument for musicians of all levels. Whether you're a professional musician or a beginner, this instrument's clear, resonant tones will enhance your performances and add a unique touch to your musical repertoire.     SUPPORTS A CAUSE: Your purchase of this frog guiro rasp helps support the efforts of Africa Heartwood Project. Enjoy the satisfaction of knowing your purchase contributes to a meaningful cause while enjoying this unique frog musical instrument. Each sale aids in providing essential resources and support to communities in need, making your musical experience both enjoyable and impactful.

The same bell worked for the New York Stock Exchange for decades to start and end their days, and is currently in place at many mines around the globe.     🔔 GREAT GUY GIFT - Add these to your boxing accessories man cave or bar and you will be the envy of friends.     🔔 REAL STEEL - The gong is made of super durable steel, and the mechanical lever action is made of solid, high-quality brass. The base is steel with black powder coating. This one rings loud and true and is designed and built to withstand even the harshest conditions. This is one fine piece of American craftsmanship.     🔔STAY SAFE- This Trip Gong is vital safety equipment in apartment houses and commercial buildings, and is a required safety device in mines around the globe. In the event of power failures or other emergencies, you can still alert those at risk.     🔔TUG O' DANGER - Mechanically operated warning device doesn’t require any electricity – but to ring the bell it must be mounted and you have to pull firmly down (as shown in the video).     🔔SAFE AND SOUND - Bevin Bells are made right here in the USA. We can guarantee a great product and ensure there is NO LEAD in any of our trip gongs.     🔔TESTED. TRUSTED. GUARANTEED SINCE 1832. Each bell we make is backed by two centuries of experience, quality, trust, in addition to a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you’re not satisfied with our products or find any defects, we’ll gladly refund them.

products.name: Deluxe Extra-Large 8" Wood Frog Guiro Rasp - Percussion Musical Instrument Tone Block - Wooden Frog Instrument with Stick, Frog Noise Maker by World Percussion USA
products.description: REALISTIC FROG SOUNDS: This Deluxe Extra-Large 8" frog sound maker produces a realistic frog ribbit or croaking sound. When used correctly, it can function as a cricket-like, high-pitch guiro or as a wood tone block, making it an excellent addition to any musical ensemble or solo performance.     NATURAL WOOD FINISH: Carved from a solid piece of wood, this traditional frog guiro features a natural brown wood finish that ensures durability and longevity without any paint to chip. This wooden frog instrument includes a stick for creating a variety of frog-like sounds.     HOW TO PLAY: Use the included wood stick to gently rake up the frog's back to create a lower-pitch cricket chirp. For a different sound, lightly tap the nose of the frog with the thick end of the striker to produce a tenor note as a wood tone block. Conveniently store the striker in the frog's mouth when not in use.     EXCELLENT ACOUSTICS: This authentic natural frog guiro offers excellent acoustics and versatility, making it a must-have frog instrument for musicians of all levels. Whether you're a professional musician or a beginner, this instrument's clear, resonant tones will enhance your performances and add a unique touch to your musical repertoire.     SUPPORTS A CAUSE: Your purchase of this frog guiro rasp helps support the efforts of Africa Heartwood Project. Enjoy the satisfaction of knowing your purchase contributes to a meaningful cause while enjoying this unique frog musical instrument. Each sale aids in providing essential resources and support to communities in need, making your musical experience both enjoyable and impactful.

SUPPORTS A CAUSE: Your purchase of this frog guiro rasp helps support the efforts of Africa Heartwood Project. products.name: Deluxe Extra-Large 8" Wood Frog Guiro Rasp - Percussion Musical Instrument Tone Block - Wooden Frog Instrument with Stick, Frog Noise Maker by World Percussion USA
products.description: REALISTIC FROG SOUNDS: This Deluxe Extra-Large 8" frog sound maker produces a realistic frog ribbit or croaking sound. When used correctly, it can function as a cricket-like, high-pitch guiro or as a wood tone block, making it an excellent addition to any musical ensemble or solo performance.     NATURAL WOOD FINISH: Carved from a solid piece of wood, this traditional frog guiro features a natural brown wood finish that ensures durability and longevity without any paint to chip. This wooden frog instrument includes a stick for creating a variety of frog-like sounds.     HOW TO PLAY: Use the included wood stick to gently rake up the frog's back to create a lower-pitch cricket chirp. For a different sound, lightly tap the nose of the frog with the thick end of the striker to produce a tenor note as a wood tone block. Conveniently store the striker in the frog's mouth when not in use.     EXCELLENT ACOUSTICS: This authentic natural frog guiro offers excellent acoustics and versatility, making it a must-have frog instrument for musicians of all levels. Whether you're a professional musician or a beginner, this instrument's clear, resonant tones will enhance your performances and add a unique touch to your musical repertoire.     SUPPORTS A CAUSE: Your purchase of this frog guiro rasp helps support the efforts of Africa Heartwood Project. Enjoy the satisfaction of knowing your purchase contributes to a meaningful cause while enjoying this unique frog musical instrument. Each sale aids in providing essential resources and support to communities in need, making your musical experience both enjoyable and impactful.

This is one fine piece of American craftsmanship.     🔔STAY SAFE- This Trip Gong is vital safety equipment in apartment houses and commercial buildings, and is a required safety device in mines around the globe. In the event of power failures or other emergencies, you can still alert those at risk.     🔔TUG O' DANGER - Mechanically operated warning device doesn’t require any electricity – but to ring the bell it must be mounted and you have to pull firmly down (as shown in the video).     🔔SAFE AND SOUND - Bevin Bells are made right here in the USA. We can guarantee a great product and ensure there is NO LEAD in any of our trip gongs.     🔔TESTED. TRUSTED. GUARANTEED SINCE 1832. Each bell we make is backed by two centuries of experience, quality, trust, in addition to a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you’re not satisfied with our products or find any defects, we’ll gladly refund them.
